mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t3.enterprise_name, t4.charge_money_num AS pay_amount, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs t1 INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t2 ON t1.self_help_invoice_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice_detail t4 ON t2.id = t4.self_help_invoice_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1} AND t4.maker_id = #{param2} AND IF(t1.accept_paysheet_cs_type = 'SINGLE', EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND self_help_invoice_detail_id = t4.id), EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs_list WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND accept_paysheet_cs_id = t1.id AND self_help_invoice_detail_id = t4.id))

SELECT t4.id, t3.enterprise_name, t4.charge_money_num, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, IF(t1.accept_paysheet_cs_type = 'SINGLE', t1.accept_paysheet_cs_url, NULL) AS accept_paysheet_cs_url FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs t1 INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t2 ON t1.self_help_invoice_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice_detail t4 ON t4.self_help_invoice_id = t1.self_help_invoice_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.maker_id = #{param1} AND t1.id = #{param2} AND IF(t1.accept_paysheet_cs_type = 'SINGLE', EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND self_help_invoice_detail_id = t4.id), EXISTS(SELECT id FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs_list WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND accept_paysheet_cs_id = t1.id AND self_help_invoice_detail_id = t4.id))

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t1.id, t2.list_file, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, t1.accept_paysheet_cs_url, t1.create_time, IF(t1.accept_paysheet_cs_type = 'SINGLE', (SELECT IFNULL(t4.name, t3.invoice_people_name) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_detail t3 LEFT JOIN diyi_maker t4 ON t3.maker_id = t4.id AND t4.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.id = t1.self_help_invoice_detail_id), (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(IFNULL(t7.name, t5.invoice_people_name)) FROM diyi_self_help_invoice_detail t5 INNER JOIN diyi_accept_paysheet_cs_list t6 ON t5.id = t6.self_help_invoice_detail_id LEFT JOIN diyi_maker t7 ON t5.maker_id = t7.id AND t7.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t5.is_deleted = 0 AND t6.is_deleted = 0 AND t6.accept_paysheet_cs_id = t1.id)) AS names FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs t1 INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t2 ON t1.self_help_invoice_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1}) temp WHERE 1=1
AND temp.names LIKE concat('%', #{param2.name}, '%')
AND DATEDIFF(temp.create_time, #{param2.beginDate}) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(temp.create_time, #{param2.endDate}) <= 0

SELECT t1.id, t3.enterprise_name, t5.service_provider_name, t1.service_time_start, t1.service_time_end, t2.list_file, t1.accept_paysheet_cs_url, t1.create_time FROM diyi_accept_paysheet_cs t1 INNER JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice t2 ON t1.self_help_invoice_id = t2.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise t3 ON t2.enterprise_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN diyi_self_help_invoice_sp t4 ON t2.id = t4.self_help_invoice_id AND t4.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN diyi_service_provider t5 ON t4.service_provider_id = t5.id AND t5.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.id = #{param1}
